meanings.definition: A member of the lizard family Iguanidae.
meanings.sent1: The iguanid basked in the sun on the rock.
meanings.sent2: I saw an iguanid scurrying across the desert sand.
meanings.sent3: The iguanid tried to do push-ups but ended up looking like a wiggly noodle.
meanings.sent4: Her movements were as agile as an iguanid darting between branches.
meanings.sent5: The iguanid's colorful scales shimmered in the sunlight, captivating onlookers.

meanings.definition: Of or relating to the lizard family Iguanidae.
meanings.sent1: The iguanid habitat was carefully recreated in the zoo.
meanings.sent2: Scientists studied the iguanid species to learn more about their behavior.
meanings.sent3: The iguanid fashion show featured outfits inspired by reptilian patterns.
meanings.sent4: Her eyes had an iguanid-like gaze, sharp and observant.
meanings.sent5: The iguanid exhibit at the museum showcased the diversity of these reptiles.
